=== Welcome ===

Dallas Team utilizes both an active mailing list as well as <nowiki>[[IRC]]</nowiki> to keep in touch with one another. Ubuntu users are encouraged to participate in both!

<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-tx-dallas|Join Mailing List]]</nowiki>

If you would like to see current conversations, as well as conversations from the past, feel free to browse the archived mailing list. 

<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-us-tx-dallas/|Read Mailing List]]</nowiki>
